value: you
I am Randy Clark I'm glad to be April
company an extremely exciting story
about the supernatural power of God I
had beside me
Karen ganas and her a really good friend
whose husband is also a doctor and she's
like volunteers caregiver and Jana yeah
and you were at a meeting that Bill
Johnson and several others were speaking
at a couple years ago in Minneapolis st.
Paul and something happened there to you
and then you came and shared with your
friend Karen here and before we get in
that store they'll Karen could you just
tell us a little bit about yourself what
you are what you do sure I'm a
neurologist and so I've been practicing
in North Dakota for about 13 years
so neurologists see patients that have a
variety of different brain conditions
and I'm a Christian who's learning how
to walk out her walk with Jesus and
watch his power I had received a phone
call and the neurosurgeon had just seen
a patient a very tragic situation it was
a 26 year old young woman and she had
her knee aid her brain had herniated
right before the eyes of the doctors the
pressure had built from a benign tumor
that was obstructing the blood
circulation and so when a person
herniates their brain swells and
compresses and there's a lack of blood
flow and it creates brain death and so
the neurosurgeon had seen this woman and
had declared her brain dead but they
needed me to come in and do a second
confirmatory examination and he was just
devastated because it was a young woman
that had a benign tumor that if they
would have been able to catch it 30
minutes earlier she would be fine and
instead here she was brain-dead and and
the family was going to be called in to
discuss or organ donation and so I was
just sharing the horrible story with
Jana as I was leaving to go to the
hospital so what happened I we were in
the we had gone to a conference a
healing conference and heard Randi and
Bill Johnson and a number of people had
gotten healed
believe it was like 800 815 a lot
through the word of the testimony away
we had never experienced we'd prayed for
people and laid hands on them and seen
healings but I had never seen just the
word of the Lord released in the power
of the testimony and so I had met Karen
at the mall watching our children sing
in a choir concert at Christmas and she
and I were talking about the word of the
testimony in the scriptures and how
jesus heals and she kept getting paged
to the hospital and you can tell what
happened so I was paged because this
young woman had gone into a brain death
situation from from an injury and I was
being asked to go back as a neurologist
and and pronounced her brain death so
that they would be able to harvest the
organs and we just cried out to God and
just asked father God would you please
restore her and we will bring you glory
and I then at that moment drove to the
hospital in in that 25 minutes right at
20 right at that moment was when she
came back to life and she came back to
life completely she went from being
brain-dead to opening your eyes
squeezing hands following commands and
that was that is totally the power of
God and there's nothing else that can do
something like that and as the week
unfolded we saw the a woman with a
devastating stroke come back and be able
to be completely restored we saw a woman
with blindness returned and a woman with
ALS a neurodegenerative condition walks
so yeh God
